original_text: I will punish your descendants. When you offer an animal as a sacrifice at your festivals, I will cover your faces with its dirty bits. Then they will throw you away with all the other dirty bits. Those are the bits that I cannot accept as clean.’
korean_text: 보라 내가 너희의 자손을 꾸짖을 것이요 똥 곧 너희 절기의 희생의 똥을 너희 얼굴에 바를 것이라 너희가 그것과 함께 제하여 버림을 당하리라

sentences.original_text: When you offer an animal as a sacrifice
I will cover your faces with its dirty bits.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그 더러운 부분들로 너희의 얼굴을 덮겠다.

sentences.original_text: Then they will throw you away
with all the other dirty bits.
that I cannot accept as clean.'
